sentence.Network_en: In 1957, the Soviets launched Sputnik 1 into outer space.
sentence.Network_cn: 1957年，苏联人将“斯普特尼克1号”人造卫星送入了外层空间。

sentence.Network_en: It is the Sputnik and is ignored at our peril.
sentence.Network_cn: 其现实意义不亚于苏联当时发射首颗人造卫星,对此视而不见是非常危险的.

sentence.Network_en: It'sent back simple radio signals. Sputnik 2 put a dog into space.
sentence.Network_cn: 它发回了简单的无线电信号. 苏联的第二颗卫星把一条狗送入太空.
